name: A Parsnip's Interment
description:
A short demo of an exploration and light puzzle game, leaning more on exploration and fetch-quests. During the game you will make friends and explore the afterlife, doing tasks and favors for the creatures you run into along the way. This short demo has two playable characters, one from the start and another you can find during the course of the game.

Press SHIFT to toggle between running and walking. I personally like the walking speed for exploring, but the running will help with backtracking.

Thank you for looking at this game, and if you choose to play and wish to report bugs, email me at cotardsdelusions@gmail.com, or send me an ask at  helloemptyset.tumblr.com.

Content Warning: This game talks about death in general, but particularly passing of sickness or by old age.  There is also some blood in the game, and rodents. There are loud noises at points, but no purposeful jumpscares.
